description.problem: Template literal variables not being resolved, appearing as raw ${...} syntax in documentation
description.impact: MEDIUM - Documentation shows raw code syntax instead of resolved values, reducing readability
description.root_cause: Template literal resolution not implemented in TypeScript parsing logic
description.fix_approach:
1. Detect ${...} pattern in extracted strings
2. Attempt to resolve from local context/constants
3. If unresolvable, choose strategy:
   - Replace with descriptive placeholder (e.g., ${endpoint} -> [API endpoint])
   - Strip template syntax (${urlParameterName} -> urlParameterName)
   - Document as "dynamic value"
4. Priority: Medium (affects docs readability, not data extraction)
